name: Tenchu: Shadow Assassins
description:
The creators of the original Tenchu, the best-selling and highest-rated
in the Tenchu series, are back with a new episode. Tenchu: Shadow
Assassins brings you back to the world of Feudal Japan to master the
deadly skills of a real ninja.

Continue the saga of Rikimaru and Ayame, elite ninjas, who will utilize
new skills and weapons to keep the peace in Feudal Japan and defend the
lands of the Goda. In this episode, you can take control of either the
stealthy and silent Rikimaru, or the aggressive and acrobatic Ayame and
use their lethal skills to unmask the face of the enemy behind a
treacherous kidnapping.

Explore the highly detailed settings of Feudal Japan. Unlock hidden
levels by collecting special artifacts as you fight through 10
missions and 50 side quests in a world of fierce combat and authentic
tradition.

Fully immerse yourself in a unique ninja experience. Use the Wii
Remote to fight, dash, jump, attack and toss projectiles like a real
ninja. Take control of over 17 historically accurate ninja weapons and
tools, including katanas, throwing stars, daggers, smoke bombs and
more; each with its own Wii Remote motion to succeed in your missions.

Use your environment as camouflage as you master the art of the silent
kill like a real ninja. Discover a wide variety of stealth
assassination techniques using your Wii Remote to kill your targets.
And when you feel like you are ready, put your advanced ninja skills
to the ultimate test in Shadow Mode.
